new.title: We’ll make this quick and easy!

city.title: Great! We cover
city.subtitle: Before you continue, please select the city/county that you live in.

edit.title: Let's start with some basic information about yourself

home.label: Do you own or rent your home?

car.label: Do you currently have car insurance?

edit.footerText: By clicking "Save & Continue," you consent to InsureOnline.com saving the information you entered and sharing it with insurance carriers so you can get the most up-to-date quotes, no matter what device you're using. Additionally, carriers may use this to obtain information about your credit history. You also agree to InsureOnline.com’s <3>Privacy Policy</4> and <1>Terms of Service.</2>

vehicles.title: Add vehicles to your quote.
vehicles.subtitle: Add up to six vehicles to your quote.

notCovered.title: Unfortunately, we don't cover {{location}}
notCovered.body: We’re sorry, but we don’t currently offer coverage in {{location}}. Please check back soon as our coverage area continues to grow.

drivers.title: Add drivers to your quote.
drivers.subtitle: Add up to six drivers to your quote.

discounts.title: Select your discounts.
discounts.subtitle: Do any of these discounts apply to you?

review.title: Everything look good?
review.subtitle: Review what you’ve added so far. If everything looks good, you can submit to get a quote. Don’t worry, you can change your quote and selection at anytime.

bolReview.title: Everything looks good?
bolReview.subtitle: Review what you’ve added so far. If everything looks good, you can submit to get a quote. Don’t worry, you can change your quote and selection at anytime.

vehicle.title: Vehicles

error.maxReached: You can not add more than {{maxVehicleNumber}} vehicles
error.presence: You must add at least one vehicle

vehicle.deleteConfirm: Are you sure that you want to delete this vehicle?

drivers.title: Drivers

error.maxReached: You can not add more than {{maxDriverNumber}} drivers
error.presence: You must add at least one driver

drivers.deleteConfirm: Are you sure that you want to delete this driver?

submit.title: We’re working to get you the best rate.

rate.title: Here's a great plan for you!
rate.BolTitle: Here's a final quote for you!

contact.title: Please contact us to finalize your quote.
contact.description: Looks like something isn't right. Please contact our team to reivew your quote and provide you with a rate.
contact.subtitle: How to contact us

mvrCopy: We’re working on a final quote. We’re collecting information from your Motor Vehicle Report (MVR) to help us improve your rate. If you have any accidents or violations then your rate might go up.

tooltipCopy.title: Why did my rate change?
tooltipCopy.content: We assume you have a good driving record. Rates may have changed based on MVR or additional information required during the buy online process.

terms: By clicking 'Save & continue,' you consent to InsureOnline.com saving the information you entered and sharing it with insurance carriers so you can get the most up-to-date quotes, no matter what device you're using. Additionally, carriers may use this to obtain information about your credit history. You also agree to InsureOnline.com’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
quoteMessaging: We’ve put together the the best quote possible based on the information you provided. We recommend {carrier.name} as your carrier!
emailMessage: Not ready to buy yet? Email yourself this quote.
footerDisclaimer: Your rate is calculated based on your location, the drivers, and vehicles that you added and assumes that you have no tickets or accidents. If you do, that's ok, we have a rate for you too. Proceed to the Buy Online process, we’ll verify your information, run your motor vehicle report and find you the best rate! Our licensed agents are available to chat online or by phone at 844-358-5605 to help you every step of the way

bolQuotesReview.toOrderAMVR: to order a Motor Vehicle Report.
bolQuotesReview.noteBody: If you cannot agree with the following statements please contact our agents in regards to any questions. When calling, please have your quote number ready.
